news_header: South Africa is revoking the identification documents of beauty queen Chidimma Adetshina, who is representing Nigeria in Miss Universe, amid a dispute over her dual nationality.
news_text: South Africa announced it would revoke the identification documents of Chidimma Adetshina, a beauty queen representing Nigeria in the Miss Universe pageant. Adetshina, who has both South African and Nigerian nationalities, faced backlash and xenophobic attacks when she attempted to compete in the Miss South Africa pageant. She withdrew for her family's safety. The South African government is investigating her mother's citizenship, claiming it may have been obtained fraudulently. Adetshina has until Monday to prove her right to her documents. After being rejected in South Africa, she won the Miss Nigeria contest and will represent Nigeria at Miss Universe in November.
